mapper.update: update t_news set flag = #{flag,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, content = #{content,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, times = #{times,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, likes = #{likes,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select id, flag, user_id, content, times, likes from t_news
